explains: vt. 重申；重新叙述；重讲

sentences.en: He continued throughout to restate his opposition to violence.
sentences.cn: 他一直不断重申他对暴力的反对。

sentences.en: They found that after a surprise departure, the probability that the company will subsequently have to restate earnings increased by nearly 20%.
sentences.cn: 他们发现，在意外离职后，该公司随后不得不重申盈利的可能性增加了近20%。
